entry.title: Across the Katsura River・桂川を渡る

link.title: Across the Katsura River・桂川を渡る

entry.content:
A film exposure of the Katsura River while crossing on the Hankyu train, taken with Fujichrome Velvia 100.

There are only a few seconds in which to take this photo. I calmly get up and approach the train door, take a few photos, then sit down again. Is this the action of an ordinary tourist?

阪急電車で桂川を渡っている間のフィルム露出、Fujichrome Velvia 100で撮影。

この写真を撮るにはほんの数秒しかない。私は落ち着いて立ち上がり、電車のドアに近づき、数枚の写真を撮ってから再び座った。これが普通の観光客の行動だろうか?
entry.summary: A film exposure of the Katsura River while crossing on the Hankyu train, taken with Fujichrome Velvia 100. There are only a few seconds in which to take this photo. I calmly get up and approach the train door, take a few photos, then sit down again. Is this the action of an ordinary tourist?

entry.title: Above the Kamogawa・鴨川の上
entry.content:
After years of talking about it, I finally went up to the roof beer garden at Kikusui, the vintage yoshoku restaurant along the Kamogawa river at Shijo Dori street. It was a warm summer evening to sit on a folding chair and take in the view of the Shijo Ohashi bridge.

長年その存在について語ってきたが、ついに四条通りの鴨川沿いにある老舗の洋食屋「菊水」の屋上ビアガーデンに行ってみた。折りたたみ椅子に座って四条大橋の景色を眺めるには、夏の夜が暖かい。

entry.title: Kyoto Station・京都駅
entry.content:
The exterior of the Isetan department store at Kyoto station has mirrored glass at all kinds of different angles, and at dusk shows a mix of interiors and outside reflections. Taken from Kyoto Tower.

京都駅にある伊勢丹百貨店の外観は、あらゆる角度の鏡面ガラスで覆われており、夕暮れ時には、内側と外側の反射が混ざり合った様子が見られる。京都タワーから撮影。

entry.title: Morning on the River・川の朝

link.title: Morning on the River・川の朝
